view.title: Developer Settings
view.description: Here you can find all the settings related to debugging Moss or experimental features
view.subtitle: Main debug options
view.subtext: Some of these require a restart to take effect!
Global debug mode for logs or other options
Weather or not to initiate logs in the terminal on startup
This refers to the notebook lines file rendering and the way that rm_lines tries to align the whole page to a common center
view.toggle: Enable debug log for LINES renderer
view.subtext: This enables detailed logs for every stroke and item during LINES page rendering. It gets messy be aware!
This enables info UI for the document viewer. It's useful for debugging issues with alignment or scale.
This adds a condition to the UI to show the rect of every button at the end of the loop. Each button is outlined in red, some rects may be wrong. This is useful for debugging button alignment issues.
